channel.title: Mesh Manual on Apache Dubbo
channel.description: Recent content in Mesh Manual on Apache Dubbo

item.title: Debug Reference Documentation
item.description: Pre-environment preparation docker environment kubernetes environment (docker desktop is recommended, with a graphical interface, and a small Kubernetes environment is embedded, and the following demonstration is also based on docker desktop) istio environment dubbo-samples code, the master branch is fine dubbo version >= 3.1.0 Build a Kubernetes environment Currently Dubbo only supports Mesh deployment in the Kubernetes environment, so you need to set up the Kubernetes environment before running and starting this example.
